data.title: Livelihood Training Mizo
data.meta_description: Livelihood Training Mizo - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides a livelihood training module in the Mizo language with 32 topics ranging from introduction to livelihood concepts to skills enhancement programs. It details the objectives, duration and expected outcomes of the training. The training aims to improve community skills and capabilities for sustainable farm, off-farm and non-farm livelihoods.
